game.name: Drift Stunt Racing 2019
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Drift Stunt Racing 2019 places drivers into a thrilling drift racing experience. Compete on some of the most challenging and exhilarating drift stunt courses that will test even the best of drivers and push them to their limit!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Drift Stunt Racing 2019 places drivers into a thrilling drift racing experience. Compete on some of the most challenging and exhilarating drift stunt courses that will test even the best of drivers and push them to their limit!
